    <metadata>

        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_279117a07fdca3b4140d3aba539f337414b5f53b</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">How fossils are made and discovered</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie Fossilien gebildet und entdeckt werden</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment des fossiles sont faits et découverts</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como os fossils são feitos e descobertos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come i fossili sono fatti e scoperti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς τα απολιθώματα γίνονται και ανακαλύπτονται</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cómo se hacen y se descubren los fósiles</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Second in a series of four illustrations showing how fossils are made and discovered. Shown here is how fossils of organisms are found by digging rocks out of the ground.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">digging</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fossils</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ground</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rocks</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">An zweiter Stelle in einer Reihe von vier 
Abbildungen, die zeigen, wie Fossilien gebildet und entdeckt werden. 
Gezeigt hier, wie Fossilien der organismen gefunden werden, 
indem man Felsen aus dem Boden heraus gräbt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En second lieu dans une série de quatre 
illustrations montrant comment des fossiles sont faits et découverts.
Est montré ici comment des fossiles des organizations sont 
trouvés en creusant des roches hors de la terre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Em segundo em uma série de quatro ilustrações 
que mostram como os fossils são feitos e descobertos. É 
mostrado aqui como os fossils dos organismos são encontrados 
escavando rochas fora da terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In secondo luogo in serie di quattro 
illustrazioni che mostrano come i fossili sono fatti e scoperti. 
È indicato qui come i fossili degli organismi sono trovati 
scavando le roccie dalla terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δεύτερος σε μία σειρά τεσσάρων απεικονίσεων που 
επιδεικνύουν πώς τα απολιθώματα γίνονται και ανακαλύπτονται. 
Εμφανισμένο εδώ είναι πώς απολιθώματα των οργανισμών 
βρίσκεται με το σκάψιμο των βράχων από το έδαφος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En segundo lugar en una serie de cuatro 
ilustraciones que muestran cómo se hacen y se descubren los fósiles.
Se muestra aquí cómo los fósiles de organismos son 
encontrados cavando rocas de la tierra.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Graben</string>
          </keyword>
